Issue.creator: senthil1
Issue.summary: remove sync up between pvtdataStore and blockstore
Issue.description: With the introduction of peer reset/rollback, we make the gossip to fetch pvtData from the local store if available. Further, we make the pvtdata reconciler to not fetch pvtData when the pvtstore is ahead of the blockstore. As we allow the pvtstore height to be greater than the blockstore height, we can safely remove the synchronization between pvtstore and blockstore.
